panels.description:
Anzeige von Prozessen und deren Threads
(inkl. Auslastung)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "fwrite" or r["functionname"] == "writev" or r["functionname"] == "write")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "hsebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
        |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "fwrite" or r["functionname"] == "writev" or r["functionname"] == "write")

panels.title: ThreadMap Panel

targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ms, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hostname")
        |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "write")
          |> group(columns: ["_field"])
            |> unique()
              |> yield(name: "unique")

from(bucket: "sebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "thread_id")
        |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "write")
          |> group(columns: ["_field"])
            |> unique()
              |> yield(name: "unique")

from(bucket: "sebucket_fileres")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
      |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "write")
        |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
          |> yield(name: "sum")
